title: Can we please add a progress bar for the level?
body:
It would be nice to know how many more games I have to act ridiculously nice to people I've never met before.

Thank you for reading.

replies.body: Don't act nice. Be nice. Done, problem solved. You will get Tier 5 eventually.
It's a black image(at least for me).
It is a sound clip of Nasus saying "It is never ending."
So you just act nice for honor levels? What a sell out. Just be yourself, have some integrity.
It is meant to be a thing to level throughout the season. Unless riot has accelerated everything you should not expect to have lvl 5 honor at the end of this season.
you shouldn't be grinding for it, riot meant for it to be a tiny thing on the side, to reward you at the end of the season for being nice.
